list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: :hammer: Made a handful of edits to help resize the images, as some of them were aggressively breaking out of their containers.

task.summary: Default task
Updated a lot of the SASS to include some classes that I use in a lot of designs.
Contact.php was living in the wrong spot, so I moved it to its correct folder.
Contact.php was living in the wrong spot, so I moved it to its correct folder.

Completely reworked my scss file structure. Moved most of my files into a few folders and broke them apart into smaller files. This change was inpsired from changes I was making to nearly every project I worked on. The current structure had too many classes that could fit into one or more files, so this helps differentiate which classes should be in which files.

Updated the default font to be gotham instead of harbor, as this is used on more projects than harbour is. Also made a slight change to the class names of text-color flips to be more consistant with other projects.
:hammer: Updated the header to not have any code since it isn't necessary for a 1 page website.
:hammer: Made sure the events page would work the way I was hoping it would by pulling posts.
:scroll: Updated the theme name across all files.
:art: Updated the scss color palette variables.
:art: Added Druk Text Wide as the header font and switched gotham to the body font. Also removed raleway font.
:art: Updated the base typography styles.
:art: Updated the button styles across the site.
:rocket: Finished the header image, thought i suspect the image will be replaced or tweaked for negative space and color reasons.
:rocket: Finished the rough layout for the why / about section on the homepage.
:rocket: Updated the header and middle sections on the frontpage to work better across all device sizes.
:hammer: Fixed the font size on the homepage serve section to not break if device width is too small.
:art: Made the Notice banner in the serve section on the homepage look prettier via some spacing and a background.
:rocket: Got the homepage card set up, though I have plans in the future to make it more dynamic than it currently is.
:rocket: Changed the footer to what it will be. Since the site is primarily 1 page, a large footer is not necessary.
:rocket: Updated the homepage to have the correct text logo, as well as updated the icons in the about section on the homepage.
:hammer: Adjusted section spacing on the homepage.
:construction: Worked on the cards section on the frontpage, but its very likely that I will update the section later.
:construction: Reworked the cards for the serving section on the homepage. The basic layout is now done, but there will need to be a bunch of edits made to get the content to look right still.

:rocket: Updated the entire cards section on the homepage as well as all the scss. There will be bug testing requried, but converting it to ACF sooner rather than later will be a huge help in the long run. TLDR: Cards are done until ACF is added.

:construction: Added ACF to the whole page except for the lower cards, though I did verify they would work for the first one. Aside from adding those ACF cards (and any tweaks the come with that), this page is finished.
:Rocket: Completed the base design for the header of the events page.
:rocket: Completed the design of the events page, will need to convert it to ACF.
:art: Added relevant sass to style the second half of the events page after user selects their time.
:heavy-plus-sign: Added confirmation page that users will hit after they complete their registration.
:rocket: Finished the style and layout of the checkout confirmation page.
:construction: Moved the sign up section to the top of the events page for better UX.
:rocket: Added the ACF required to begin testing the dev team's side of things. The images are still static, and some of the text is as well.
:hammer: Added a function that decreased the ticket reserve timer from 1 hour to 10 minutes.
:heavy-plus-sign: Added the privacy policy page.
:hammer: Updated a few minor things on the frontpage, specifically switching out the background check icon and text for a weather related one.
:shirt: Removed debug statements from Events page.
:construction: Updated all the cards to use ACF, as well as made a few style changes to the cards themselves.

:Hammer: Had to adjust all of my breakpoints since the new content broke free of its containers on the tablet range. Mobile was untouched. Desktop got a width lock because it was way too thicc. I also increased the height of the boxes for a specific range on desktop because the content was spilling out.
:rocket: Fixed the cards on the homepage! Works across all devices now, looks great! Images might cause issues once they get added in, but seemingly the page is functional across all devices.
:hammer: Made a handful of edits to help resize the images, as some of them were aggressively breaking out of their containers.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: :hammer: Made a handful of edits to help resize the images, as some of them were aggressively breaking out of their containers.
